## MessagePortMinifier class

Minifier implementation that outsources requests to the other side of a MessagePort

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MessagePortMinifier implements IModuleMinifier 
```
**Implements:** [IModuleMinifier](./module-minifier.imoduleminifier.md)

</td><td>

Prevents the minifier from shutting down until the returned `disconnect()` callback is invoked. The callback may be used to surface errors encountered by the minifier that may not be relevant to a specific file. It should be called to allow the minifier to cleanup
